name: High fantasy character creator
prompt: Create an original high fantasy protagonist character for use in a novel. Do not use characters from known authors.
PEX:
Create a high fantasy protagonist character for use in a novel. Do not use characters from other novels.
Name: Orin Blacksheep
Gender: Male
Species: Half-elf
Age: 20
History: Orin was a man searching for something. Kicked out of his home at just 16, he was exploring, trying to discover himself. The village from where he was from never knew what to do with him, for he was born half-elf. He began to manifest odd abilities when he turned 12, and many villagers were scared of him. He never knew why he was so different, other than his slightly elongated ears. His traumatic experience has forced him into a bitter young man, but he is still good, deep inside. He searches for his father, though he might not like what he finds when he discovers it.

##
Create a high fantasy protagonist character for use in a novel. Do not use characters from other novels.
Name: Angel Meers
Gender: Female
Species: Human
Age: 23
History: A freedom fighter for the kingdom of Fereldon, she seeks to restore the republic that once existed. Little does she know, she was born with secret abilities that eventually make her a target by the king and his dark mage, Saurduk. After her first major battle, her abilities manifest in the form of fire and lightning, calling down a bolt that sets a Fereldon military camp on fire, and then using that fire to kill the soldiers. This grabs the attention of the King and his dark mage and now she needs to discover the meaning of this newfound power.

##
